parts.text:
Hey {{2.`1`}} ,

I came across {{2.`5`}} and was really impressed with your work in the shipping and logistics space.

That said, I noticed an opportunity to streamline and automate some of the data-heavy processes you deal with â€” especially when it comes to invoices, shipment documents, and container pricing.

At ProEleve, weâ€™ve built a powerful **AI-Powered Data Extraction Agent** that can help shipping companies like yours:

âœ… Extract key details from emails and scanned PDFs (invoices, BLs, rate sheets)  
âœ… Identify container pricing (20ft, 40ft) and port information with precision  
âœ… Automatically update your internal systems or Google Sheets  
âœ… Eliminate manual errors and reduce document processing time by 80%  
âœ… Enable real-time visibility across your shipping workflows  

Whether you're dealing with hundreds of shipment emails a day or need to streamline your client invoicing process, our automation system can plug right into your workflow â€” with zero code required.

If you're open to it, Iâ€™d love to show how our tool can apply directly to {{2.`5`}} 's operations.
